com.esri.mo2.ui.lyt
Class LayoutTemplate

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.ui.lyt.LayoutTemplate
public class LayoutTemplate
extends Object

This class defines a template for the layout. Currently, it is a placeholder for the future functions of serilizing/de-serializing pre-defined layout templates by users.

          The default constructor

          Construts a LayoutTemplate based on the given Page

setPage

public void setPage(Page page)
Sets page size. If there is Page in the current template, all the PageEvent(s) will be tranferred into the new Page set here. It will be ignored if the new page is null.

Parameters:
page - the new page size

getPage

public Page getPage()
Gets page size
